thread.section_title: PRTG Network Monitor Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von PRTG Network Monitor | paessler.com
thread.title: Stephen Gundrum
thread.title_full: PRTG Network Monitor bewertet von Stephen Gundrum

author: Stephen Gundrum
title: Stephen Gundrum
text: I use this software to monitor the equipment at my job and love the different options available. When I found out that I can get 100 sensors at no cost, I installed the software to monitor my home network and servers. I get the information that I need and alerts when something goes down. I recommend this software if you have a need for monitoring.
